EquipEffect.VitalSystem1:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="e80e114413384d93997879c1a364bf41" Scale="1"/]No training necessary to achieve this
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]HP increase[System:Color name="Default"]. Indeed, there is no force in
the universe more powerful than science!
EquipEffect.VitalSystem2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="b19ba4b2fa6e45ec9d8a205649c2c5c5" Scale="1"/]An even stronger version of my original
Tuff Stuff. Why work hard for an [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]HP
increase [System:Color name="Default"]when science can do it for you?
EquipEffect.VitalSystem3:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="3e02e1e94eaa4795af6fa81ca32d3439" Scale="1"/]For those interested in obtaining the
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]highest levels of HP[System:Color name="Default"], I present to you this
marvel. Science, you have done it again!
EquipEffect.MetalSystem1:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="c58fc6e0e7fe4b6184e590077b135852" Scale="1"/]I've harnessed the invisible power of air
with the inspiring power of science to
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]harden your space suit against damage[System:Color name="Default"]!
EquipEffect.MetalSystem2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="3baee896eec048a0a49c8225335b8e4d" Scale="1"/]By compressing the air, I've made it even
MORE damage absorbent! Damage done
to your space suit will now be [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]halved[System:Color name="Default"].
EquipEffect.MetalSystem3:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="740fe972463643908161ff6dac037e58" Scale="1"/]Kee-HEE! I was able to compress the air
to its very limit! It can now [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]absorb 75%
of damage[System:Color name="Default"]! It's a true masterpiece.
EquipEffect.AntiElectric:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="6a34d5e6d6b24924b3f6b5028f0c3d84" Scale="1"/]An extra layer that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]doesn't conduct
electricity[System:Color name="Default"]! You need not fear lightning
when it can't ever reach you.
EquipEffect.FlareGuard:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="164bbc211a554d6884fe1446639335a9" Scale="1"/]Made from premium [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]fireproof[System:Color name="Default"] fabric,
it will protect you from any inferno.
Plus, it's moisture wicking!
EquipEffect.IceGuard:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="ec03fdf9052a4c15881c91199d86c1c3" Scale="1"/]Wear this to keep your fluctuating body
temperature in line! [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Never freeze[System:Color name="Default"] again,
even in sub-subzero temperatures.
EquipEffect.AntiNoroNoro:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="8bc2a3d65a9d4a5ca7239e52730242e2" Scale="1"/]Coated in a sealant that repels the
gooiest of gunk, you [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]won't be impeded [System:Color name="Default"]by
sticky paths while wearing these boots.
EquipEffect.DashBoots1:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="85e737b1a48c4bcfbe25812f997cd39b" Scale="1"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]faster you go[System:Color name="Default"], the more you explore!
Isn't that right? It'll take everything they
have for the Pikmin to keep up with you!
EquipEffect.RocketPunch:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="37546a2420a8425c99ce1962c371c69d" Scale="1"/]And so I bestow upon you the power of
the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]triple punch[System:Color name="Default"]! They say even a tin can
can shatter a boulder with enough blows.
EquipEffect.CarryArm:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="ef5fd6aee9b44772b43bf9464651d086" Scale="1"/]I hear you only [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]carry the same amount
[System:Color name="Default"]as a single Pikmin... There's absolutely no
shame in giving science a noble purpose!
EquipEffect.VitalSystem1Happy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="9260060f9711497da000b18107f84c4d" Scale="1"/]Some say there is no shortcut to building
stamina. Fools! Even [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]increase
his HP [System:Color name="Default"]with this on his collar!
EquipEffect.VitalSystem2Happy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="dd0c607542424b68b7e393ced5cfa1a1" Scale="1"/]This uses gentle static electricity to
stimulate [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s nervous system and
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]increase his HP[System:Color name="Default"]!
EquipEffect.VitalSystem3Happy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="66c6511cf977429bb323df57da4ec833" Scale="1"/]Now that I know all of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s pressure
points, I've officially [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]maxed out his HP[System:Color name="Default"].
Science, you continue to impress me.
EquipEffect.MetalSystem1Happy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="821f3dbc0abe41829645f058ee8d7387" Scale="1"/]This little trinket condenses the air
surrounding [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s body to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]reduce
overall damage[System:Color name="Default"]! Miraculous!
EquipEffect.MetalSystem2Happy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="02562b91f5f44de48f47d6794e66cb5c" Scale="1"/]I've improved damage absorption by
increasing the rate of air condensation.
Now [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] will only take [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]half damage[System:Color name="Default"]!
EquipEffect.MetalSystem3Happy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="c2304b777d7646f696d4877ea5594d7a" Scale="1"/]The air surrounding [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] gets packed
into [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]1/4 [System:Color name="Default"]of the space! You're about to
witness the ultimate [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]impact reducer[System:Color name="Default"]!
EquipEffect.AntiElectricHappy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="115ba344017840aca44ab23ded5adbbd" Scale="1"/]With this gear equipped, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]can't be
electrocuted[System:Color name="Default"]! It redirects the electricity
with the power of induction!
EquipEffect.FlareGuardHappy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="9819e7426f9c4ff6b47f2c49be314378" Scale="1"/]Once you understand the science behind
a Red Pikmin's fire resistance, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
can easily be made [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]fire resistant [System:Color name="Default"]too!
EquipEffect.IceGuardHappy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="44a045072e4748f8ad154dc831e79966" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can withstand the cold, but that
doesn't mean he can't catch frostbite!
This will [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]protect him from freezing[System:Color name="Default"].
EquipEffect.PoisonGuardHappy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="e2a72781caf04e879c8f427151a0e019" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s keen olfactory instincts leave
him vulnerable to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]poisonous aromas[System:Color name="Default"].
But science can [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]dissolve those toxins[System:Color name="Default"]!
EquipEffect.HeadLamp1:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="fc26b4351fea488eb3550eb5eeeaf988" Scale="1"/]If your sight lines are [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]well lit[System:Color name="Default"], you can
avoid danger before it finds you! And
so I introduce to you this lamp.
EquipEffect.HeadLamp2:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="a4e51357aa2f47498c542e16554b375f" Scale="1"/]I've improved the output and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]increased
the scope of its beam[System:Color name="Default"]. Kee-hee! Not even
the darkest of nights can outwit science.
EquipEffect.NewOtakaraSensor:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="67c9468bd3f64b29a0f44e1f2720a963" Scale="1"/]This sensor [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]detects treasure and
castaways [System:Color name="Default"]nearby. No need to rely on
your "natural instincts" to guide you now!
EquipEffect.NewOtakaraSensorPlus:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="86907ff95c24493f9dab742b22b74f9b" Scale="1"/]Now you can see the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]total amount and
locations of the treasure[System:Color name="Default"]! Time to go
back and double-check your work.
EquipEffect.HimajinCounter:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="b29a279a583b462d8cbbf2965911c5e2" Scale="1"/]Shows a running tally of how many
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikmin are standing idle[System:Color name="Default"]. There's no
time to lollygag on a rescue mission.
EquipEffect.Drone:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="0532ad7bd3b1404ebc8ae3de82b5027f" Scale="1"/]It's imperative to explore your
surroundings from every vantage point.
Use this drone to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]scout the area[System:Color name="Default"]!
EquipEffect.TotsugekiFue:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="756c425582eb45b2a7b61035b24dedda" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Charge" scale="0.56"/], and this horn will order
selected Pikmin to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]charge[System:Color name="Default"]! Press
repeatedly to charge with entire squad.
EquipEffect.ShugoFlag:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="8e74bf25a47940adb2973886750fb58e" Scale="1"/]Why manually [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]collect Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"] that have
completed their tasks when you can
summon them with this?
EquipEffect.ShugoExFlag:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="17fd0a7a23e744538ec813078c734868" Scale="1"/]When your Pikmin go missing, [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]call them
back to the S.S. Beagle[System:Color name="Default"]! This works on
any Pikmin not currently in your squad.
EquipEffect.TairetsuFue:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="6a8178622df74f45ba34d57587e29d2e" Scale="1"/]The tone of this whistle will inspire your
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikmin [System:Color name="Default"]to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]get into formation[System:Color name="Default"]. Then hold
down [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_ZL_Button_Tairetsufue" scale="0.56"/], and move your squad with [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Stick_Tairetsufue" scale="0.56"/]!
EquipEffect.NukiFue:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="22a92e79e12d493294208829c442114e" Scale="1"/]Do not waste your time and effort
plucking Pikmin one by one. One blow on
this whistle will [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]pluck them all at once[System:Color name="Default"]!
EquipEffect.WideFue:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="b79c8bfc9a1f466ba52f35ae35325014" Scale="1"/]Kee-hee! I increased the whistle's [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]range[System:Color name="Default"]
by, well...a lot! It should now be even
easier to gather your Pikmin.
EquipEffect.AntiWind:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="947ca9610c574078bb05b787d4c4caf6" Scale="1"/]These boots intensify your legs' bracing
abilities, preventing you from being [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]blown
away[System:Color name="Default"] or [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]sucked up[System:Color name="Default"] by creature attacks.
EquipEffect.Bag_Drone:
[UE:Meta key="0a717baa20e04fcfacae6e502e27de7f" Scale="1"/]A drone that can [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]scout the area from the sky[System:Color name="Default"]. It can drop
up to three pins to flag landmarks of your choice.
EquipEffect.Bag_ShugoFlag: [UE:Meta key="beed6023316c4519a5641ee20c8ddc2e" Scale="1"/]Recall [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]idle [System:Color name="Default"]Pikmin to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]wherever you sound the alert[System:Color name="Default"].
EquipEffect.Bag_ShugoExFlag:
[UE:Meta key="10b259fd6943489292510c78f94c85ae" Scale="1"/]Recall all Pikmin currently outside your squad, including those
fighting creatures or midtask, to the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ][Carrot:SpaceshipName/] [System:Color name="Default"]right away!
EquipEffect.Hero_VitalSystem2:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="f433f10a54ef4c15bcf1e1674ca71a07" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Increases stamina [System:Color name="Default"]and reduces one's
risk of going down.
EquipEffect.Hero_MetalSystem2:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="664ae7167c90470f9699ac99f35f266c" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Reduces damage[System:Color name="Default"] dealt to my space suit
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]by half[System:Color name="Default"].
EquipEffect.Hero_DashBoots1:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="93c290e25a3a44b9be6f174595611e07" Scale="1"/]Boots that allow me to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]walk faster[System:Color name="Default"].
Just think of how much more exploring
I'll be able to get done.
EquipEffect.Hero_RocketPunch:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="b36a625d29554275bf2a005af0fa5f47" Scale="1"/]And a one! And a two! And a three!
And a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]triple punch [System:Color name="Default"]can't feel too good.
EquipEffect.Hero_VitalSystem2Happy:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="ce11ac71fa80476f9ae35117686b923e" Scale="1"/]I bet with [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]increased HP[System:Color name="Default"], [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] will be
eager to take on the scarier creatures.
EquipEffect.Hero_MetalSystem2Happy:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="9dbaddfd3b6b4a54bd160bd1ce27dff7" Scale="1"/]This will decrease any damage dealt to
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] by [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]half[System:Color name="Default"].
EquipEffect.Hero_TotsugekiFue:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="d655b927db4c41a6849af904e076a957" Scale="1"/]I can order my squad of Pikmin to [Grammar:Decap/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Charge
[System:Color name="Default"]when I press [PictureFont:IconData key="Charge" scale="0.56"/], and then they'll quickly
surround a ship part or creature.
EquipEffect.Hero_TairetsuFue:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="44b87e55e76142adbc7f4914c4d73c98" Scale="1"/]A mysterious whistle that makes [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikmin
fall in line[System:Color name="Default"]. First I hold down [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_ZL_Button_Tairetsufue" scale="0.56"/], then I'm
able to control my whole squad with [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Stick_Tairetsufue" scale="0.56"/].
EquipEffect.Hero_NewOtakaraSensor:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="073a5c4f3bf0423bb58c88ab1d72af1f" Scale="1"/]A sensor that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]detects ship parts
[System:Color name="Default"]nearby. I could use all the help I can get.
EquipEffect.Hero_HimajinCounter:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][UE:Meta key="3889afae4f8d4707afd660fa5291dab9" Scale="1"/]Shows me just how many [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikmin are
standing idle[System:Color name="Default"]. Better round them up!
EquipEffect.Hero_VitalSystem2_Reward: [UE:Meta key="7a8f99812cd14f708e75a5affb2774ec" Scale="1"/]Space-suit upgrade that[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] increases HP[System:Color name="Default"].
EquipEffect.Hero_MetalSystem2_Reward:
[UE:Meta key="49c513ef132441f18ac54d09fe2887a0" Scale="1"/]Air Armor that reduces damage[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] [System:Color name="Default"]made to
the space suit [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]by half[System:Color name="Default"].
EquipEffect.Hero_DashBoots1_Reward: [UE:Meta key="c1a4140e80cf4921b67f73e3fe834ae7" Scale="1"/]Boots that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]significantly increase [System:Color name="Default"]speed.
EquipEffect.Hero_RocketPunch_Reward:
[UE:Meta key="b455395349ef4c07b800504fa21a8a79" Scale="1"/]Gloves that give the ability to perform
a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]triple punch[System:Color name="Default"].
EquipEffect.Hero_VitalSystem2Happy_Reward: [UE:Meta key="b15ffdce5f824a50ac3e0ce11e5a91dd" Scale="1"/]Accessory that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]increases [System:Color name="Default"][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] HP[System:Color name="Default"].
EquipEffect.Hero_MetalSystem2Happy_Reward:
[UE:Meta key="408c489e2b744e65868ff70ab46c72cb" Scale="1"/]Air Armor that reduces damage[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] [System:Color name="Default"]dealt to
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]by half[System:Color name="Default"].
EquipEffect.Hero_TotsugekiFue_Reward:
[UE:Meta key="7c2a4a75f9404140aec7e2ce61a1fed1" Scale="1"/]Horn that orders selected Pikmin
to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]charge [System:Color name="Default"]when you press [PictureFont:IconData key="Charge" scale="0.56"/]. Press
repeatedly to use the whole squad.
EquipEffect.Hero_TairetsuFue_Reward:
[UE:Meta key="e00bbda29c0a450dafde9536aafb472e" Scale="1"/]Whistle that makes [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikmin line up[System:Color name="Default"]. While
holding down [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_ZL_Button_Tairetsufue" scale="0.56"/], move [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Stick_Tairetsufue" scale="0.56"/] to control
your entire squad.
EquipEffect.Hero_NewOtakaraSensor_Reward: [UE:Meta key="06917b613dcf495986005e7cf449b99d" Scale="1"/]Sensor that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]detects ship parts[System:Color name="Default"].
